TrcFtcLib.ftclib

Class FtcServoActuator

  • java.lang.Object
    • TrcFtcLib.ftclib.FtcServoActuator

  • public class FtcServoActuator
extends java.lang.Object
    This class implements a platform dependent servo actuator. A servo actuator consists of one or two servos. Servo actuator and supports speed control the servo actuator.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  FtcServoActuator.Parameters
      This class contains all the parameters related to the servo actuator.

      • FtcServoActuator

        public FtcServoActuator(java.lang.String servo1Name,
                        java.lang.String servo2Name,
                        FtcServoActuator.Parameters params)
        Constructor: Create an instance of the object.
        Parameters:
        servo1Name - specifies the name of the first servo.
        servo2Name - specifies the name of the second servo, can be null if none.
        params - specifies the parameters to set up the servo actuator.

                        FtcServoActuator.Parameters params)
        Constructor: Create an instance of the object.
        Parameters:
        servoName - specifies the name of the servo.
        params - specifies the parameters to set up the servo actuator.

    • Method Detail

      • retract

        public void retract()
        This method sets the servo actuator to its retract position.

      • retract

        public void retract(TrcEvent event)
        This method sets the servo actuator to its retract position and signals the given event after retract time has expired.
        Parameters:
        event - specifies the event to be signaled after retract time has expired.

      • retract

        public void retract(double time,
                    TrcEvent event)
        This method sets the servo actuator to its retract position and signals the given event after the specified time has expired.
        Parameters:
        time - specifies the time to wait before the event is signaled.
        event - specifies the event to be signaled after specified time has expired.

        This method sets the servo actuator to its extend position.

        Parameters:

      • extend

        public void extend(double time,
                   TrcEvent event)
        This method sets the servo actuator to its extend position and signals the given event after the specified time has expired.
        Parameters:
        time - specifies the time to wait before the event is signaled.
        event - specifies the event to be signaled after specified time has expired.

      • setPower

        public void setPower(double power)
        This method moves the servo actuator as if it is speed controlled. The speed of the actuator movement is proportional to the specified power.
        Parameters:
        power - specifies the power value from -1.0 to 1.0 where the magnitude proportional to its speed.

      • getPosition

        public double getPosition()
        This method returns the last set servo actuator physical position.
        Returns:
        last set position in physical unit.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double position)
        This method sets the servo actuator position in physical unit.
        Parameters:
        position - specifies the position in physical unit.

      • setPosition

        public void setPosition(double position,
                        double time,
                        TrcEvent event)
        This method sets the servo actuator position in physical unit and signal the given event after the given time has expired.
        Parameters:
        position - specifies the position in physical unit.
        time - specifies the time to wait before the event is signaled.
        event - specifies the event to be signaled after specified time has expired.
